summary: A FedEx invoice dated October 14, 2002, for account number 1144-2081-6, billed to Jeffrey E. Epstein at 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY. The invoice details shipping charges for 12 shipments sent between October 2-9, 2002, from Epstein's address to various recipients, including Ghislaine Maxwell and other associates.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: The FedEx account is billed to him at 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY. Multiple shipments are sent from this address under his name.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as the recipient of a FedEx Standard Overnight package sent from Jeffrey Epstein's address on October 7, 2002, to Beverly Hills, CA.

persons.name: S. Griffis
persons.context: Signed for a package delivered on October 3, 2002, sent from Jeffrey Epstein to an address associated with 'Epstein Interests'.

persons.name: L. Melick
persons.context: Signed for a package delivered on October 7, 2002, sent from Jeffrey Epstein to Palm Beach Gardens, FL.

persons.name: N. Lemus
persons.context: Signed for a package delivered on October 7, 2002, sent from Jeffrey Epstein to Admissions Emporeris College in Santa Monica, CA.

persons.name: W. Doulin
persons.context: Signed for two packages delivered on October 9, 2002, and October 4, 2002, sent from Jeffrey Epstein to 'The Villard House' and 'Epstein Intrust', both at the same Madison Ave address.

persons.name: C. Cox
persons.context: Signed for a package delivered on October 8, 2002, sent from Jeffrey Epstein to Casey Wasserman in Beverly Hills, CA.

persons.name: B. Smith
persons.context: Signed for a package delivered on October 8, 2002, sent from Jeffrey Epstein to West Palm Beach, FL.

persons.name: I. Childs
persons.context: Signed for a package delivered on October 9, 2002, sent from Jeffrey Epstein to a passport service lockbox in Pittsburgh, PA, addressed to Lauren Kwintner.

persons.name: Lauren Kwintner
persons.context: Listed as the 'Passport Supervisor' recipient of a package sent to a passport service lockbox in Pittsburgh, PA.

persons.name: Casey Wasserman
persons.context: Listed as the recipient of a FedEx Standard Overnight package sent from Jeffrey Epstein's address on October 7, 2002, to Beverly Hills, CA.

connections.description: Epstein sent a FedEx package to Maxwell at a Beverly Hills address, indicating a personal or professional connection.
Epstein sent a FedEx package to Wasserman at a Beverly Hills address.

events.title: FedEx Shipping Activity
events.description: A series of 12 FedEx shipments were sent from Jeffrey Epstein's New York address to various recipients across the US, including Ghislaine Maxwell, Casey Wasserman, and addresses in Florida, California, and New Mexico.

locations: 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022-6843 (Jeffrey Epstein's primary address)
358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL 33480
1807 B. Wilshire Blvd., Santa Monica, CA 90403 (Admissions Emporeris College)
500 Ross St RM 151-067, Pittsburgh, PA 15219 (Passport Service Lockbox)
The Villard House, 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022
Epstein Intrust, 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's FedEx account (1144-2081-6) was active in October 2002, with invoices sent to his 457 Madison Ave, New York address.
Ghislaine Maxwell is listed as a recipient of a FedEx package sent from Epstein's address on October 7, 2002, to Beverly Hills, CA.
Multiple shipments were sent to Epstein's Palm Beach, Florida, residence (358 El Brillo Way) and other Florida addresses.
Shipments were also sent to educational institutions (Admissions Emporeris College) and a passport service, indicating varied correspondence.
The document provides a detailed log of Epstein's shipping activity and network of contacts during this period.
